column1: Smoque BBQ////So while Smoque definitely ranks near the top of my nationwide BBQ list
column2: it is certainly the best in Chicago and everyone should go here often.  Oh and the wait is super long so if you just roll up and ask for a table
column3: you'll be waiting super long.   My advice is order takeout and they'll give you a specific time to come in and get it. And although you may feel guilty walking past the fools in line and going straight to the register
column4: you deserve it for planning ahead.  Even just calling on your way over will get you a lot closer to that brisket platter.  Oh and ask for the thick sauce too.  I prefer it to the more vinegary style sauce that comes with the platter.
